name: Hilton Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at the Hilton Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport on June 2, 2007 and that experience was the worse ever in any hotel.
reviews.title: Horrible room service, food, shuttle service

likes.disliked: — Away from the city. No public late pm transportation. Secluded. No nearby restaurants. Horrible food/room services. Slow shuttle service. Too pricey (food, room). Horrible breakfast. No hotel activities, quiet, boring.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would never recommend the Hilton Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport in Paris France. It was awful (food, room service, management).
reviews.title: Modern hotel, large rooms, plush comfort

likes.liked: — Comfort, large rooms, shuttle to the airport
likes.disliked: — I can't really fault this hotel for anything

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived late and since all restaurants were closed, we ordered room service. It took 1 hour to receive the food which half was missing (they forgot half of the order) and the other half was cold. We left the food sitting in the room, very disappointed as there were NO other choices of dining places. Also, there was no clock in the room. We were also told that breakfast (when we booked through Hotels.com) would be included in our room rate, and it wasn't. There were no bath accessories, shower gel, shampoo, etc (nothing). We felt like we were in prison staying there. Also, the shuttle service was VERY late picking us up from the airport. We had to call and they finally made it. They were also late leaving to take us back to the airport and we almost missed our plane. The shuttle driver stood outside for 20-25 minutes smoking while anxious passengers sat on the shuttle to try to rush to catch their flight. He said the shuttle leaves every 15 minutes, when in fact it had been well over 15 minutes and the shuttle bus was full and we were ready to leave. The shuttle driver looked at me like I was crazy when I asked when the bus would be leaving (after it just sat for over 20 mins with no word from him). The service is not guest friendly and if I would have known that I would have chosen the Marriott Hotel or Sofetil which were nearby. By the way we ordered (from room service) french onion soup that was the worse mush I've ever had (mind you, this is France and I expected better) and my husband couldn't even eat his FRENCH fries which arrived cold. That is such a sad representation of the Hilton. We are rewards card users that even though I gave the front desk our rewards card number, I don't even trust that she entered it into the system (they were so unorganized at the front desk).
reviews.title: Treated like royalty

likes.liked: — reception, room accomadations ( comfort, quiet) and location as close to airport

reviews.text: Our excellent experience at Barcelona Hilton was like night and day to the horrible experience at Hilton Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport. I would think the service would be consistent at every Hilton. Makes me very leary about booking with Hilton again. I would expect much better service.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel and super convenient into Paris!

likes.liked: — Convenient to the airport by free shuttle and easy access to train station into Paris

reviews.text: To make matters "the worst" we were sent an email saying we could not get Hilton Rewards credit for this hotel stay since it was booked through Hotels.com. Even though the front desk reception told us we would get credit upon check in. The staff seemed to be very uninformed and not caring or paying attention to details, nor helpful to our needs.
reviews.title: Outstanding airport hotel

reviews.text: I am very picky about hotels and I was very apprehensive about staying in this hotel as it did not have very good reviews on tripadvisor....The main reason I picked it was for the location(we had a flight out the next day) and the price.
reviews.title: Great Airport Hotel

likes.disliked: — Smaller rooms which required us to get 2 rooms for a family of 4

reviews.text: However.... I have to say I was pleasantly surprised. The hotel was so much better than I expected: the rooms were comfortable,clean and well appointed, the breakfast which was included in our rate was great and the staff were very nice....
reviews.title: Still great

reviews.text: The only drawback was that the rooms were on the smaller side and can really only accomodate 2 people so we had to get 2 rooms for our family of four.
reviews.title: Very close to the airport

likes.disliked: — There is nothing around if you don't go into the city

reviews.text: I would definitely stay at this hotel again if I had to stay in a hotel close to the airport.....it was very good value... (we paid the advance purchase rate of 189 Euros including breakfast) ...and has a great location.
reviews.title: Good Stay at Hilton CDG

reviews.text: I have stayed here before and often dont expect the same experience twice.
reviews.title: Woke up to stranger in the room. Had to chase him away
Good call staying at the airport
reviews.text: This was a great hotel. We thought about staying in Arc De Triomphe area and heading to the airport in the morning, but we opted to head straight out to CDG so we wouldn't have to wrestle rush hour traffic.

reviews.title: Poor Shuttle service but nice rooms

reviews.text: My room was clean, comforable and efficient for connecting to the internet and communicating.
reviews.title: NIce place

reviews.text: The next morning we checked out and hopped right onto the Hilton shuttle van to the terminal. They leave every 20 minutes or so.
reviews.title: Very good airport hotel, but unreliable shuttle service

reviews.text: The fog was like pea soup, so needless to say, I was very glad to get to the airport early.
reviews.title: Great Airport Hotel

likes.liked: — Location to airport and executive lounge

reviews.text: The first Hilton I’ve stayed at and the best so far.
reviews.title: Breezed By Paris

reviews.text: The décor, service are exactly what you’d expect from a Paris Hotel.
reviews.title: Hotel honors Hilton name
Great airport hotel
reviews.text: The food from the Kitchen was excellent and varied.
Recommend it now to every one staging through Charles De Gaulle.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great Staff!

aka: Hilton Paris Charles De Gaulle Airport Hotel Roissy
